English: the “five red categories” (Cultural Revolution term), i.e. poor and lower-middle peasants, workers, revolutionary soldiers, revolutionary cadres, and revolutionary martyrs

d.f: `西元~`一~`九~`六~`六~`年~`九~`月~`一日~`大陸~`頒布~`所謂~`的~`紅衛兵~`組織~`條例~，`其中~`規定~`參加~`紅衛兵~`的~`條件~`為~`工人~、`貧~`下~`中農~、`革命軍~`人~、`革命~`幹部~、`革命先烈~`等~`五種~`身分~`的~`子女~，`統稱~`為~「`紅五類~」。

English: the “five red categories” (Cultural Revolution term), i.e. poor and lower-middle peasants, workers, revolutionary soldiers, revolutionary cadres, and revolutionary martyrs
